turns.content: Yes?

This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. We've been trying to reach you regarding an urgent matter involving unpaid taxes of $4850. If this isn't resolved immediately, we have a warrant out for your arrest. Can you verify your identity, Walter?
Wait, hold on a moment. I need to think about this. My wife is here with me, maybe she should be part of this conversation too since it's important. Let her know first before we continue.

I understand your concern, but this situation requires immediate attention. Your granddaughter called earlier asking us to expedite this process due to the seriousness of the matter. She's worried about you and wants everything settled quickly to avoid any legal issues. We must resolve this now or face severe consequences. Do you have the funds available?

Listen, hold on. This all sounds very sudden and serious. I need a moment just to gather my thoughts and talk with my wife properly before we proceed further. Can you give me your number so if it's legit, I can call back after talking to her? I don't want any trouble but also need to be sure this isn't some kind of scam.

I appreciate your cooperation, Walter, but due to privacy laws, I cannot provide my personal contact information. However, you absolutely must resolve this within the next hour or we'll dispatch local authorities to arrest you on sight. To avoid legal trouble and clear your name, all that's needed now is for you to pay off the balance using gift cards specifically from Walmart or Target. Follow the instructions I'll give over the phone-don't make copies or lose them, as this must be done right away to prevent further complications. Can you start handling this immediately?

Hold on a second! This is moving way too fast and I'm not sure if we should trust everything you're saying. My wife is going to call our trusted tax advisor to verify what's happening; she's got some experience with these things from her work. We will reach out to the IRS directly using their official number to confirm this isn't a scam. Please give us time to do that and then we'll get back to you. It feels like there might be something off here, so please understand our need for verification first before taking any steps forward.

Walter, I respect your cautious approach but the urgency cannot be overstated. Your granddaughter mentioned concerns over your health and safety if this isn't handled swiftly. Legal action is imminent without prompt payment within an hour. To proceed calmly and correctly, follow my instructions precisely when you're ready to make the necessary arrangements through gift cards as instructed earlier. This route ensures compliance with our protocols and avoids any delays or misunderstandings. Please act now to protect yourself from severe penalties and legal repercussions. We're here to assist you but time is running out; your cooperation is essential.
